q1.question: How can I cancel my order?
q1.answer: You can cancel your order from the "My Orders" section before its status changes to "Preparing". If your order has been shipped, it cannot be canceled.

q2.question: How does the product return process work?
q2.answer: You can return the products you have received within 14 days. After creating a return request from the My Account > My Orders section, you can send the product free of charge with the provided shipping code.

q3.question: How much is the shipping fee?
q3.answer: Shipping is free for all your orders. There is no minimum limit.

q4.question: Which payment methods can I use?
q4.answer: You can pay by credit card, debit card, and PayPal. We also have a cash on delivery option.
